articles.title: These baby animals were born during the coronavirus pandemic - CNN
articles.description: Zoos and animal parks may be temporarily closed, but baby animals are still being born around the world
articles.content:
(CNN) What does a porqupette in Florida, a baby sea turtle in the Maldives and a bald eaglet from Catalina Island have in common? 
These animals were all born during a pandemic.
